doc:
Monica Lewis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monica_Lewis 0 Monica Lewis (born May Lewis; May 5, 1922 – June 12, 2015) was an American jazz singer and film actress. Lewis was the longtime voice of Chiquita Banana in that company's animated ad campaign, beginning in 1947. Monica_Lewis ( born May_Lewis ; May_5_,_1922 – June_12_,_2015 ) was an_American_jazz_singer_and_film_actress . Lewis was the_longtime_voice of Chiquita_Banana in that_company 's_animated_ad_campaign , beginning in 1947 .
